to: Description The Thornley Knitted Polo is easily a hero piece for the season, offering a perfect blend of sustainability and style. Made from 100% organic cotton, it features a unique 12-gauge autumn waffle knit that stands out thanks to its rectangular rather than square sections, giving the texture a more elongated, modern look. The design is kept classic and functional with a traditional three-button placket and ribbed cuffs and hem to help hold its shape. It’s the kind of effortless essential that feels just as good as it looks. 3 Button Flat knit Constructed Placket Tonal Ribbed Collar And Cuff Embroidered Gold F Fit Relaxed Fit Relaxed Fit. Designed With A Looser Fit For A Modern, Casual Style. Composition And Care 100% Organic Cotton 12 Gauge Knitted Construction For A Premium, Sweater-Like Feel Machine Wash

to: Description The Birch Knitted Polo is a standout piece for anyone looking to add some subtle texture to their rotation. Crafted from a 12-gauge, two-colour knitted jacquard, it features a distinctive waffle appearance that offers a substantial feel without being heavy. To finish it off, it’s designed with a shorter, wider two-button placket, giving the classic polo silhouette a slightly more modern, relaxed edge. 2 Button Flat Knit Constructed Placket Tonal Ribbed Collar And Cuff Iconic Farah Tab Branding Fit Relaxed Fit Relaxed Fit.
